import React, { useState, useCallback, FC } from 'react' import styles from './popupTweet.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../../images/png/Bitmap.png' export const tweetsArr: any = [] const PopupTweet: FC = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState('') const ChangeEvent = useCallback( (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setValue(e.target.value) }, [setValue] ) const Click = (e: React.MouseEvent) => { tweetsArr.push(value) setValue('') } const KeyPressHandler = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { tweetsArr.push(value) setValue('') } } return (
X
